author: CBS News
title: With U.S. in lockdown, hope and calm beat nervousness - CBS News poll
description: Some report stress but most stay optimistic as life changes.
content:
Amid the coronavirus outbreak, the personal has become national: the more danger you think you and your family are in from the virus, the more trouble you think the country is in, too.
Americans report staying calm and hopeful most of the time amid the outbr… [+4516 chars]
